name: Survive 10
description:
Mechanics:

Clear all enemies in 10 seconds to get to the next level. Be mindful of your health bar at the bottom. Good luck!

This game was made for #BulletHellJam2021. If you could record some gameplay of the game, we'd love to see it! You can contact us through Discord.

Music used:
Jeremy Blake - Powerup!

WASD FOR MOVEMENT
CLICK TO SHOOT

Seizure warning/Epilepsy warning: This game contains flashing lights. User discretion is advised.
